00037 double sopt_ran_gasdev2(int idum) {
00038 
00039   double gasdev2_dp;
00040   double fac,rsq,v1,v2;
00041   static int iset = 0;
00042   static double gset = 0.0;
00043     
00044   if (iset ==0) {
00045     do {
00046       v1=2.*sopt_ran_ran2(idum)-1.;
00047       v2=2.*sopt_ran_ran2(idum)-1.;
00048       rsq=v1*v1+v2*v2;
00049     } while(rsq >= 1.0 || rsq == 0.0);
00050     fac=sqrt(-2.*log(rsq)/rsq);
00051     gset=v1*fac;
00052     gasdev2_dp=v2*fac;
00053     iset=1;
00054   }
00055   else {
00056     gasdev2_dp=gset;
00057     iset=0;
00058   }
00059   
00060   return gasdev2_dp;
00061       
00062 }

00089 double sopt_ran_ran2(int idum) {
00090 
00091   int IM1=2147483563,IM2=2147483399,IMM1=IM1-1, 
00092     IA1=40014,IA2=40692,IQ1=53668,IQ2=52774,IR1=12211,IR2=3791, 
00093     NTAB=32,NDIV=1+IMM1/NTAB;
00094 
00095   double AM=1./IM1,EPS=1.2e-7,RNMX=1.-EPS;
00096   int j,k;
00097   static int iv[32],iy,idum2 = 123456789; 
00098   // N.B. in C static variables are initialised to 0 by default.
00099 
00100   if (idum <= 0) {
00101     idum= (-idum>1 ? -idum : 1); // max(-idum,1);
00102     idum2=idum;
00103     for(j=NTAB+8;j>=1;j--) {
00104       k=idum/IQ1;
00105       idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00106       if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00107       if (j < NTAB) iv[j-1]=idum;
00108     }
00109     iy=iv[0];
00110   }
00111   k=idum/IQ1;
00112   idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00113   if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00114   k=idum2/IQ2;
00115   idum2=IA2*(idum2-k*IQ2)-k*IR2;
00116   if (idum2 < 0) idum2=idum2+IM2;
00117   j=1+iy/NDIV;
00118   iy=iv[j-1]-idum2;
00119   iv[j-1]=idum;
00120   if(iy < 1)iy=iy+IMM1;
00121   return (AM*iy < RNMX ? AM*iy : RNMX); // min(AM*iy,RNMX);
00122 
00123 }

00142 int sopt_ran_knuthshuffle(int *perm, int nperm, int N, int seed) {
00143 
00144   int *scratch;
00145   int i, j, tmp, nmax;
00146 
00147   // Check inputs.
00148   if (nperm > N) {
00149     SOPT_ERROR_GENERIC("Number of required permutations greater than number of integers");
00150     return 1;
00151   }
00152       
00153   // Allocate scratch space.
00154   scratch = (int*)malloc(N * sizeof(int));
00155   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(scratch);
00156 
00157   // Initialise scratch space.
00158   for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
00159     scratch[i] = i;
00160 
00161   // Initialise random number generator with negative seed.
00162   seed = abs(seed);
00163   sopt_ran_ran2(-seed);
00164 
00165   // Compute permutation.
00166   // If require nperm = N permutations then don't permute last element.
00167   nmax = nperm < N-1 ? nperm : N-1; // min(nperm, N-1)
00168   for (i = 0; i < nmax; i++) {
00169 
00170     // Generate random index j in [i,N-1].
00171     j = (int)(sopt_ran_ran2(seed) * (N - i));
00172     j = j + i;
00173 
00174     // Although j in [i,N-1] enforce this to be sure.
00175     j = (j >= N ? N-1 : j);
00176     j = (j < i ? i : j);
00177 
00178     // Swap entries i and j.
00179     tmp = scratch[i];
00180     scratch[i] = scratch[j];
00181     scratch[j] = tmp;
00182 
00183   }
00184     
00185   // Copy required data from scratch space.
00186   for (i = 0; i < nperm; i++)
00187     perm[i] = scratch[i];
00188 
00189   // Free memory.
00190   free(scratch);
00191 
00192   return 0;
00193 }
